name: DeadWave | MundoAlexoGameJam2019
description:
Hello! This is our second game made by us for an Online Game Jam  for a community, the community is for indie developers on the world but mainly from LATAM. Here's the link to join us! https://www.facebook.com/groups/universoindiegamedev
Here's our twitter where you can check the  uploads of our current project "Wave Run" an third person plataformer with Subway Surfers vibe.
